 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָגַם‎</span>] **verb** ==be grieved== (Late Hebrew ***id***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֲגַם‎</span>, and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (in Lexicons) ***id***; compare perhaps also Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***agâmu***</u></abbr>, ***be vexed*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 16</sup> (rare; cited under <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אגם‎</span>)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִםלֹֿא ֗֗֗ עָֽגְמָה נַפְשַׁי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאֶבְיוֺן‎</span> [[Job.30.25|Job 30:25]] ***was not my soul grieved for the poor ?*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּכִיתִי‎</span>).
